info.name: Reddit i.redd.it Cleanup & Fixes (image pages)
info.description: Reddit SUCKS, so I made this. Removes bloat, Fixes cropping when zooming large images, and changes image scaling to Nearest-Neighbor, so Pixel Art is clean. (only on i.redd.it direct-image pages)
info.additionalInfo: If you don't want the image scaling change, just edit "pixelated" to "auto" in the code. • 1.0 — June 11, 2023: → Uploaded.
